alert.note: Alert for Curry; Roosevelt (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 10:51PM MDT until May 10 at 11:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Roosevelt County in east central New Mexico... Southeastern Curry County in east central New Mexico... * Until 1130 PM MDT. * At 1050 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cannon Air Force Base to near Pep, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clovis, Portales, Texico, Dora, Causey, Cannon Air Force Base, Arch, Pep, Oasis State Park and Portair. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 381 and 397. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
